to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject:
Re: debian etch netinstall 32 bit iso like is already provided for
	sarge release
body:
Yes hopefully i386 and amd64 installs will be available
soon.  But will the playoffs now on, not sure how much work
will actually get done.

S

On Wed, Apr 11, 2007 at 05:14:33PM -0500, Nick Gawronski wrote:
> Hi, Will there be a netinstallation CD for etch with speakup and 2.6.18
> kernel as there is one for sarge as I am going to have to reinstall debian
> on my system and would like to wait tell the etch speakup netinstallation
> CD is released rather then installing sarge and then upgrading to etch.
